content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Maryam, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. I must say, it's a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. It's quite close to all important facilities like the supermarket and public transportation, so it's quite convenient. Now, about the rental price, I was thinking of something around 2000 Euros.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's a little high for me, Mister Schmidt. I'm a student and I'm trying to find the most affordable option. Would you be willing to lower the price?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Sure, Maryam. I could consider lowering the price a bit. How about 1900 Euros? I'm trying to get the best price possible, you understand.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's still a bit steep for me. I'm sure you understand that as a student, I have a limited budget. Can you offer something more reasonable?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Of course, Maryam. I understand your situation. How about 1800 Euros? I'm trying to be accommodating, but I do want to get a fair price for my property.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's still not quite within my budget. I really appreciate your understanding. Can you go a little lower?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Alright, Maryam. I'll go a little lower. How about 1700 Euros? That's as low as I can go. I don't want to give it away for nothing, you understand.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's still a bit high for me. I really appreciate your understanding. Can you go a little lower?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: [Your response contains the agreed price.] I agree to the price of [1600 Euros] Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Great, thank you so much, Mister Schmidt. I appreciate your understanding and accommodation. I'm really looking forward to living in your apartment.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: [Your response does not contain the agreed price.] TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
